name: Burger Mania (itch)
description:
Burger mania is a AR single player game, puzzle and cooking game. The player will have to find the burger recipes, collect the ingredients and assemble the burger as per the recipe in order to score points and complete the game.

This game has to be downloaded to be played and was designed for AR on an android mobile device.

Assets from the unity asset store that are used in the project are: 'Quick Outline' by Chris Nolet and 'Joystick Pack' by Fenerax Studios. 

Made in collaboration with Amelia130 (https://amelia130.itch.io/) and KornV (https://kornv.itch.io/)
